app.name: Clash Nyanpasu
app.one_liner: A Clash GUI based on Tauri with support for Clash Premium, Mihomo, and Clash Rust.

core_loop: Users manage proxy profiles, configure providers, and control network traffic through a Material You-designed interface built with Tauri and React.

screens.name: Dashboard
screens.purpose: Display overview of proxy status, quick actions, and current configuration.

rust_commands.name: save_item
rust_commands.purpose: Persist user configuration or profile data to disk.

mvp_plan: week 1: Set up Tauri v2 project structure
week 1: Implement basic profile loading and saving
week 1: Create dashboard UI with Material You styling
acceptance_tests: User can toggle proxy state from the dashboard.
Application supports importing local configuration files.
open_questions: How should Lua/JavaScript profile enhancements be sandboxed?
What is the optimal strategy for syncing config_dir across devices?
